title: Home
content: Malang is the Fine Arts and Photography club of BVP COE Pune.

title: Events
content: Malang organizes exhibitions, art contests, and photography workshops.

title: Gallery
content: Explore our creative works including photos, paintings, and digital art.

title: Core Members
content: Meet the talented artists, designers, and photographers behind Malang. Core members: Prasun, Goutam, Tejas, Mohini, Priya, Satyam.
